title: Two hymns for the nativity of Christ Whereunto are added, a new-yeers gift, and an hymn for the feast of Twelf-Tide. The music part being set by Mr. R.M.
author: R. M.
notes: Though the title page reads: The music part being set by Mr. R.M., there is no music present.
A8v has an illustration, signed by Samuel Ward, entitled: All in all.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
